TITLE: Displaying Read Time for Single Post in Loop (PHP)
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to display the read time estimate for a single post within the WordPress loop.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-read-time/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: PHP
CODE:
```
<?php hh_the_read_time(); ?>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Read Time for Post Outside Loop (PHP)
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to display the read time estimate for a specific post outside the WordPress loop using the post ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-read-time/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: PHP
CODE:
```
<?php hh_the_read_time( $post->ID ); ?>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Helphub Post Types Plugin in WordPress
DESCRIPTION: These are the steps to install the Helphub Post Types plugin in WordPress. It includes both automatic and manual installation methods.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-post-types/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
1. Upload the ZIP file through the "Plugins > Add New > Upload" screen in your WordPress dashboard.
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
3. Visit the settings screen and configure, as desired.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the HelpHub Repository for Local Development
DESCRIPTION: Command for cloning the HelpHub repository as the wp-content directory in a local WordPress installation. This is part of the setup process for local development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/WordPress/HelpHub.git wp-content
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing NPM Dependencies for HelpHub
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required NPM packages defined in package.json. This installs all tools needed for running Grunt tasks and working with the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Watch Mode for Continuous SASS Compilation
DESCRIPTION: Command to start Grunt in watch mode, which automatically compiles SCSS files into CSS whenever changes are saved. This is useful during active development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
grunt watch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Grunt to Compile SASS Files
DESCRIPTION: Command for compiling SCSS files into CSS using Grunt. This is needed after making style changes to the HelpHub theme.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
grunt sass
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using the codex_languages Shortcode in WordPress
DESCRIPTION: Example of using the 'codex_languages' shortcode with language keywords to create links to translated Codex articles. This shortcode allows linking to the English version and a Japanese translation of 'Version 4.6'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-codex-languages/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: WordPress
CODE:
```
[codex_languages en="Version 4.6" codex_ja="version 4.6"]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: PHP Configuration Settings for HelpHub
DESCRIPTION: Required PHP configuration settings that need to be enabled in the php.ini file for HelpHub to function properly. These settings allow the application to fetch remote content.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: php
CODE:
```
allow_url_fopen = On
allow_url_include = On
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Plugin Metadata in WordPress README
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the metadata for the Table of Contents Lite WordPress plugin, including contributors, compatibility, version, and license information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/table-of-contents-lite/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
=== Table Of Contents Lite ===
Contributors: carl-alberto
Donate link:
Tags: wordpress, plugin, table of contents
Requires at least: 3.9
Tested up to: 4.5.3
Stable tag: 1.0
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
```

TITLE: Sample Copyright Notice for GPL-Licensed Programs

SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-contributors/LICENSE.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
<one line to give the program's name and a brief idea of what it does.>
Copyright (C) <year>  <name of author>

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or
(at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along
with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
```

TITLE: Interactive Program GPL Notice Example
DESCRIPTION: An example of a short notice to be displayed when an interactive GPL-licensed program starts. It includes copyright information and instructions for viewing warranty and redistribution details.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-contributors/LICENSE.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author
Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'.
This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it
under certain conditions; type `show c' for details.
```

TITLE: Sample Copyright Disclaimer for GPL-Licensed Programs
DESCRIPTION: An example of a copyright disclaimer that can be used by employers or organizations to disclaim copyright interest in a GPL-licensed program written by an employee or member.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/helphub/blob/master/plugins/support-helphub/inc/helphub-contributors/LICENSE.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program
`Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker.

<signature of Ty Coon>, 1 April 1989
```
